name: Crocalor
description: The Fire Croc Pokémon. The combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: When this Pokémon attacks an opponent, it ignores any stat changes the opponent has been affected with after the start of battle.
